channel.title: Port forward?
channel.description:
Well I am trying to get my server to run but it has constantly failed. I disabled the firewall on my computer and went into my router and port-forwarded it. For some reason when I try to connect to my server through my no-ip, it says "error connecting to server". When I change my client to connect through 127.0.0.1, it works. Error Connecting [IMG]http://i210.photobucket.com/albums/bb247/zmurphygerling/rspsfail/errconn.jpg[/img]
My Ports [IMG]http://i210.photobucket.com/albums/bb247/zmurphygerling/rspsfail/rspsport.jpg[/img]
I have no-ip connecting to my ip address.
Any help?
EDIT
[IMG]http://i210.photobucket.com/albums/bb247/zmurphygerling/rspsfail/no-ip.jpg[/img] no-ip is on also
IDK WHY THIS IS HAPPENING BUT I KEEP GETTING THESE NULLED CONNECTIONS -.- I HAVE NOT EVEN TOLD ANYONE TO CONNECT. RUNE-LOCUS EVEN SAYS MY SERVER IS OFFLINE...
[IMG]http://i210.photobucket.com/albums/bb247/zmurphygerling/rspsfail/nulls.jpg[/img]
